snippet: Michael Grabner scored the go-ahead goal late in the second period and Evgeni Nabokov made 26 saves as the Islanders took another step toward the playoffs with a 4-1 win over the Flyers.
lead_paragraph: Michael Grabner scored the go-ahead goal late in the second period and Evgeni Nabokov made 26 saves as the Islanders took another step toward the playoffs with a 4-1 win over the Flyers.
